Content.String: To edit or delete a presentation, select the appropriate button next to the presentation you wish to edit or delete.
There are no saved Presentations to play
Are you sure you want to delete this presentation?

Select sections on the left to add them to your presentation on the right. Tap the red minus buttons to deselect a section. Sections will re-order in the order in which you select them. Tap the Next button to select specific slides within the sections.
Tap the thumbnails to select slides. If you tap the Previous button your selections will not be saved. We advise 10 slides maximum for a 10 minute presentation. Tap Next to save your presentation.
Please enter the name of the presentation and tap SAVE:
